description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying detailed information about a recipe. It includes UI components like an image, ingredients, steps, favorite toggle, and metadata. It manages loading state, fetches recipe data, and handles navigation, styling, and user interactions.

classes.name: RecipeDetailScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays detailed information about a recipe with various UI sections, fetching data if necessary, handling favorites and navigation.

classes.name: _RecipeDetailScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state and logic of RecipeDetailScreen, including data fetching, user interactions, and UI state management.

classes.name: _MetaChips
classes.description: A StatelessWidget displaying metadata about the recipe like duration, servings, and difficulty as styled chips.

classes.name: _ErrorState
classes.description: A StatelessWidget rendering an error message with a back button when recipe data is unavailable or an error occurs.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers data loading.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Performs data fetching for the recipe, either using provided recipe or fetching by ID, and manages loading/error state.

methods.name: _toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of the current recipe using the FavoritesProvider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the main UI, including loading/error handling and recipe display.

methods.name: _buildBody
methods.description: Builds the core content of the screen, including image, ingredients, steps, and metadata.

methods.name: _difficultyLabel
methods.description: Returns a string representing the difficulty level of the recipe.
